title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 71.2 - Public use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 71.2 - Public use

State Regulations
(a) Except for an
authorized vehicle, or snowmobile, no person shall operate or park a motorized
vehicle other than on a town road or in a designated parking area unless it is
a farm vehicle engaged in legitimate farming practices. (b) No person shall operate a snowmobile
where prohibited by posted notice. (c) No person shall use a mechanically
propelled boat or canoe in the area. (d) No person shall camp in the area for more
than three days without first obtaining a permit from: State Forest Ranger, New

York State Department of Environmental Conservation, 182 East Union Street, Suite 3, Allegany, NY 14706- 1328. (e) No person shall deposit garbage, refuse, waste, paper or other litter or obnoxious materials in the area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
71.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
